Posts.Content: I have late stomach cancer which spreaded into bone only for now and my doctor will give me taxotere because 5fu+cisplatin chemo didnt work...my case is similar to breast cancer patient who has met to bone...so what would be my outcome of treatment with taxotere..i did receive radiation for tumor in my bone and that helped me a lot...i have no pain now but very weak and will start taxotere only cause i am 75 year old and the doctor may think that is all i can handle...combination chemo is better result?
Posts.Title: Plz Help me
